page.title: 20PRINCIPAL FEATURES
page.content: SHIRLEY STATION Used by commuters for travelling to and from Birmingham.The station is particularly busy at 8.30am. and 5.00pm. AQUEDUCT This carries the Canal and the River Cole and a road winds underneath. CANAL This is mostly used for pleasure trips by narrowboats.It is much busier in the summer months. DRAWBRIDGE This is a particularly interesting feature of the area.It is lifted by the use of a windlass.Situated close by is "The Drawbridge Pub"-a fairly new hostelry which serves beers and meals of a "bargee" flavour.
